  • Sweet Corn cob - fresh - 1
  • Red chilly powder - 1/2 tsp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Lemon juice - 1 tb sp
  • Water - 1 liter ( to boil corn )
  • Chives/ spring Onions - garnish ( optional )
Procedure:
  • Add water and 1/2 tsp salt in a medium sized bowl over medium heat
  • Let water boil &Â Put a corn cob in it
  • Close with lid
  • Cook 10 mins and turn off heat
  • Immediately strain water
  • Let it become cool
  • Meanwhile, Mix red chilly powder, salt and lemon juice in a cup
  • Apply the mixed paste on boiled corn cob ðŸŒ½
  • Serve immediately..Aww! Is anyone drooling ðŸ¤¤?

Step by step process shown below with pictures: Note:
  • Adjust spices according to taste
